scripts.build: npm run clean && npm test && cat library/src/*.js > Phoenix/$npm_package_name.js && uglifyjs Phoenix/$npm_package_name.js --compress --mangle --output Phoenix/$npm_package_name.min.js
scripts.lint: jshint --config jshint.json Gruntfile.js library/ && jscs --config jscs.json Gruntfile.js library/
